Package jwrc.game

Class PropertyOverlord

java.lang.Object
jwrc.game.PropertyOverlord
public class PropertyOverlord
extends java.lang.Object
This class takes care of the property options such as building houses/hotels and mortgaging properties.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static int numOfHouses  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    PropertyOverlord()
    Static methods are called from this class.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void buildHotel​(Player player, int siteIndex)
    This method builds a hotel if conditions are met.
    static void buildHouse​(Player player, int siteIndex)
    This class will build a house on a site if conditions are met.
    static void liftMortgage​(Player player, int propertyIndex)
    This class lifts a mortgage from a property for the mortgage value plus 10%.
    static void mortgageProperty​(Player player, int propertyIndex)
    This method sets the mortgage active status of a property to true if mortgage conditions are met.
    static java.lang.Integer printMortgageOptions​(Player p)
    This class prompts the user to select a property from the list of properties they own.
    static void sellHotel​(Player player, int siteIndex)
    This method sells a hotel if conditions are met.
    static void sellHouse​(Player player, int siteIndex)
    This method sells a house from a site if selling conditions are met.You will receive half the house cost to your account
    static boolean siteColourChecks​(Player player, int siteIndex, int option)
    This method checks if an action(build house, sell hotel) is vaild given the state of other sites of its colour group.
    static java.lang.Integer siteIndexSelector​(Player p)
    This class prompts the user to select a site from the list of sites they own.

    • numOfHouses

      public static int numOfHouses

  • Constructor Details

    • PropertyOverlord

      public PropertyOverlord()
      Static methods are called from this class.

  • Method Details

    • siteIndexSelector

      public static java.lang.Integer siteIndexSelector​(Player p)
      This class prompts the user to select a site from the list of sites they own. Once selected it will check the validity of the site and return this value.
      Parameters:
      p - The player selecting a site they own
      Returns:
      Returns the board index of the site they select.

    • printMortgageOptions

      public static java.lang.Integer printMortgageOptions​(Player p)
      This class prompts the user to select a property from the list of properties they own.
      Parameters:
      p - The player selecting a property they own.
      Returns:
      Returns the board index of the property the user selects.

    • mortgageProperty

      public static void mortgageProperty​(Player player, int propertyIndex)
      This method sets the mortgage active status of a property to true if mortgage conditions are met. The player will also receive the mortgage value to their account.
      Parameters:
      player - The player wishing to mortgage a property.
      propertyIndex - The board index of the property they'd like to mortgage.

    • liftMortgage

      public static void liftMortgage​(Player player, int propertyIndex)
      This class lifts a mortgage from a property for the mortgage value plus 10%.
      Parameters:
      player - The player lifting the mortgage
      propertyIndex - The board index of the property.

    • siteColourChecks

      public static boolean siteColourChecks​(Player player, int siteIndex, int option)
      This method checks if an action(build house, sell hotel) is vaild given the state of other sites of its colour group.
      Parameters:
      player - the player whoe's sites need to be checked
      siteIndex - The index of the site
      option - This corresponds to the action we are taking. Depending on this value, the method will perform checks for a specific action(e.g 0 - buildHouse, 1- sellHouse).
      Returns:
      Returns true if checks are complete and operation can continue.

    • sellHouse

      public static void sellHouse​(Player player, int siteIndex)
      This method sells a house from a site if selling conditions are met.You will receive half the house cost to your account
      Parameters:
      player - The player wishing to sell a house
      siteIndex - The board index of the site they want to sell.

    • sellHotel

      public static void sellHotel​(Player player, int siteIndex)
      This method sells a hotel if conditions are met. It will replace the hotel with 4 houses and add half the hotel cost to the players account.
      Parameters:
      player - The player wishing to sell a hotel
      siteIndex - The board index of the hotel

    • buildHotel

      public static void buildHotel​(Player player, int siteIndex)
      This method builds a hotel if conditions are met. It will remove 4 houses from the site and replace with a hotel with added rent cost.
      Parameters:
      player - The player wishing to build a hotel
      siteIndex - The board index of the site to build a hotel on.

    • buildHouse

      public static void buildHouse​(Player player, int siteIndex)
      This class will build a house on a site if conditions are met. This will increase rent cost and house cost deducted from players account.
      Parameters:
      player - The player wishing to build a house.
      siteIndex - The board index of the site they wish to build on.
